title: requests for {css,js,etc} return html
body:
i have been bashing my head against this for hours. this is a new install of 5.0 on arch linux, all packages up to date, using nginx, php-fpm, mysql.

every request (while logged in) returns html. also appears to only be the html of the main page. this leads to a bare page which does nothing.

nginx.conf: https://gist.github.com/ripdog/893f65c1ae98e81e46ce (just noticed the wrong redirect for adminer, lol)
php-fpm.conf: https://gist.github.com/ripdog/7fb81a63d4da4e2d4469
php.ini: https://gist.github.com/ripdog/794309bca170441e3780
.htaccess: http://pastie.org/private/ncox4juhhogrbcvb6w0g (the gist refused to submit for some reason...)
owncloud.log: http://pastie.org/private/coqxkduyozsta33yxgpa5w (nothing interesting there, but i know you'll ask for it.)

this is the last in a long line of errors i've been having, including a lot of issues with php-fpm giving (iirc) "no input file" or "file not found", and i'm pretty sure these problems are related. 

i have researched this issue quite a lot, and i've tried acceptpathinfo on, cgi.fix_pathinfo=1, fiddling with content compression (it is off in php and nginx), debug mode, none have made a lick of difference. 

here is what i see: http://i.imgur.com/1qqzn1u.png

this happens in firefox and chrome. here is an ss of the chrome network inspector: http://i.imgur.com/xefuasx.jpg

as you can see, everything is returned as text/html, w/ 200 ok.
